page.title: 06Ropley School Fete
page.content: Because Council money can't provide all the things school needs,parents organise fund raising events.This year there has been an Antiques Road Show, an auction,a fete and a Go-Kart Grand Prix.These events have been supported by all the village people.The fete was on June 29th,it was lovely weather and lots of people came.There were side shows,strawberry cream teas,raffles & a BMX display team.The highlight was a Go-Kart race which local firms had sponsored.Each childs Go-Kart,which was home-made,had a driver and two pushers and after time trials the fastest Karts were in the final.The circuit was the triangle round school. Three girls won the race.The fete raised Â£329 from sponsors and Â£169 from the other attractions.School is going to buy audio-visual equipment with the money.
